author: cschneider
msg: CAMEL-4067 Adding closes for streams and improving the test so it shows the cause better

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-2766] Fix issue with code first services that have parts starting
with "return" not honoring the partnames correctly.
[CXF-1714] Mark asm optional in the bundles.
Format the generate javadoc a lot nicer.
Updated cxf-extension-wstx-msv-validation.xml to write the warning message.
[CXF-3534] making RMTxStore to work with Oracle DB
[CXF-3498] Initial support for WADL resources referencing abstract resource_type definitions
[CXF-3553] Adding a boolean ignoreRequests property to WADLGenerator
[CXF-3521] - WebServiceContext.getUserPrincipal() is null for incoming SAML Token or transformed token
[CXF-3524] - Support Derived Keys with the Symmetric Binding + SAML Assertions
[CXF-3535] - Use the Requested(Un)AttachedReference returned from an STS to refer to a SecurityToken for signature
[CXF-3565] - Support pluggable way of configuring WS-Trust ActAs and OnBehalfOf behaviour
Add a BundleActivator to find the bus-extension.txt files in other
bundles so the Bus can pick them up automatically and get them
Remove the extensions from the activator list on unregister
[CXF-3568] - Add the ability to cache returned tokens in the STSTokenValidator
Minor updates to actually run now.
[CXF-3219] WS-RM's inbound to update the ack range in the store
Adding a default expires value of 5 minutes for a SecurityToken
Update the (un) attached references that the STS returns with the correct TokenType/ValueType attributes.
CXF-3571 CXF HTTPTransportFactory should throw exception when it can't find a right HTTPDestinationFactory to use
[CXF-3561] Adding a test with custom conduit selector overriding Message.ENDPOINT_ADDRESS without failover
Add support for the case of specifying an IssuedToken as a SignedSupportingToken.
- This is for the use-case of getting a Bearer SAML Assertion from an STS, and signing it before sending it to the service provider.

author: dkulp
msg: Fix more test failures on AIX.

author: zwoop
msg: TS-827 TSMimeHdrFieldValueStringInsert() can use freed memory to edit
This only affects plugins as far as we can tell, but is an important fix,
since it could potentially cause buffer overruns for plugin developers.
